subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets have been unsettled at shortstop for two years. With a live bat but a defense that remains a work in progress, Wilmer Flores still has the confidence of the team’s front office.
snippet: The Mets have been unsettled at shortstop for two years. With a live bat but a defense that remains a work in progress, Wilmer Flores still has the confidence of the team’s front office.
